description:
The law offices of Dallas & Turner are dedicated to assisting people in Prestonsburg, Kentucky, with matters involving personal injury and negligence. People who have been injured in tractor-trailer collisions, motor vehicle accidents, pedestrian accidents, motorcycle accidents, slip-and-fall incidents, wrongful death, medical malpractice or defective products often need a strong representative they can trust. Our team of reputable attorneys put their full attention into each case and often achieve successful outcomes for clients as a result.

When clients come into our law offices for their free initial consultation, they will be greeted by caring professionals who truly care. We will listen to the circumstances surrounding the incident and partner with clients to build a strong case. Our law offices attempt to simplify the legal process throughout Kenton, Boone, Grant, Campbell and Gallatin counties, and we are happy to take credit cards in addition to other forms of payment.

Attorneys James Ryan Turner and Jordan Dallas Turner are members of many prestigious organizations, including the Kentucky Bar Association, American Association of Justice, Ohio Association for Justice, the Kentucky Justice Association and the Northern Kentucky Bar Association. Ms. Turner is admitted to the Eastern District of Kentucky and works to bring justice to clients through injury litigation and negotiations. Mr. Turner has received awards from The National Trial Lawyers: Top 40 Under 40, the Multi-Million Dollar Advocates Forum and listed in the Super Lawyers Rising Stars list.
